summary: ACE8WIN - A gaming matchmaking platform where admins create 1vs1 matches with configurable timing. Users register with game UID, game name, phone number, and refund QR code, then join matches by paying via UPI to 'ace8zonereal@ptyes' with auto-generated QR codes. Users upload payment proof for admin approval/rejection. Features include transaction history with refund tracking, duplicate join prevention, admin controls to view joined players, WhatsApp messaging integration, and account management. Mobile-optimized with gaming aesthetic.
architectural_notes: UPI payment integration with fixed ID 'ace8zonereal@ptyes'
QR code generation for payment amounts
Payment proof image upload and storage
Admin approval workflow for payment verification
User profile includes: game UID, game name, phone number, refund QR code
Role-based access: first account is admin, subsequent are users
Mobile-first responsive design with gaming theme
